|stockos = Linux;2.6.33.2;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2 |pwr_barrel_len = 10 |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = boot log |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = |defaultssid = dlink,dlink_media |defaultssid_regex = ^dlink$,,,^dlink_media$ |default_ch = |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WRG-ND08 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/06/2010 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 790069336119 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0042X3F76 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Ralink;RT3092; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Simultaneous Dual-Band
10/100 Ethernet
"8WRGND08.1A1G" is silkscreened on the board. The default SSIDs for the router are '''dlink''' (2.4 GHz) and '''dlink_media''' (5 GHz). '''Note:''' Telnet is enabled by default on (at least) FW v1.00. Credentials are '''Alphanetworks''':wrgnd08_dlob_dir815. The power adapter included with the router is a '''Global Yeou Diann Electric Industrial''' AMS3-0502500SU. ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== TX and RX pins are clearly marked on the board @ '''JP1'''. GND is right above the TX pin. {{SCollapse|Serial info |{{/Serial info}} }} ==Pictures==
